item.title: Alliance Laundry 首次登陆纽交所，股价上涨，估值达 48 亿美元
item.description: Alliance Laundry Systems 周四在纽约首次上市时股价大涨 11.4%，估值接近 48.3 亿美元，使这家商用洗衣机生产商成为最新一家利用繁荣上市市场的公司。【原文：Alliance Laundry Systems was valued at nearly $4.83 billion after its shares jumped 11.4% in their New York debut on Thursday, making the commercial laundry machine maker the latest to capitalize on a buoyant listings market.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：美国与沙特芯片协议可能很快敲定
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四援引知情人士的话报道，美国和沙特阿拉伯正在推进一项允许美国芯片公司向沙特阿拉伯出口半导体的协议，该协议可能很快就会敲定。【原文：The U.S. and Saudi Arabia are advancing on an agreement that would allow U.S. chip companies to export semiconductors to Saudi Arabia and a deal could be finalized soon, the Wall Street Journal reported Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 偏空 ETF 因押注股市回调而大量流入
item.description: 偏空的交易所交易基金押注于股指以及科技和人工智能等快速上涨的行业，正吸引着大量资金流入，因为高昂的价格和政策风险刺激一些投资者为回调做准备。【原文：Short-bias exchange-traded funds, which bet against stock indexes and fast-rising sectors like technology and artificial intelligence, are drawing strong inflows as lofty prices and policy risks spur some investors to position for a pullback.】

item.title: 每个电子都很重要可再生能源股票为何重获关注
item.description: 资金重新流入可再生能源股票，为这些公司的股票注入了新的活力，推动了这些股票自本十年初可持续发展热潮以来最强劲的季度上涨。【原文：A return of fund inflows into renewable energy stocks is helping to breath new life into these companies' shares, powering their strongest quarterly rise since the sustainability boom early this decade.】

item.title: 美国 30 年期固定抵押贷款利率下降，潜在购房者保持观望态度
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率本周有所下降，但不确定的经济前景和不温不火的招聘使潜在购房者保持观望。【原文：U.S. mortgage rates fell this week, but an uncertain economic outlook and tepid hiring are keeping prospective homebuyers on the sidelines.】

item.title: 巴尔称，美联储应谨慎对待降息，因为存在通胀风险
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）理事迈克尔-巴尔（Michael Barr）周四发表讲话称，美国央行应在进一步降息的问题上谨慎行事，他在讲话中大力强调了通胀风险，同时也承认 "大致平衡 "的劳动力市场存在潜在的脆弱性。【原文：The U.S. central bank should move cautiously on further interest rate cuts, Federal Reserve Governor Michael Barr said on Thursday, in a speech that leaned heavily into the risks of inflation, even as he acknowledged the potential vulnerabilities in a "roughly balanced" labor market.】

item.title: 阿斯利康耗资 45 亿美元的弗吉尼亚工厂破土动工，制药商纷纷讨好特朗普
item.description: 阿斯利康（AstraZeneca）位于弗吉尼亚州的新工厂周四破土动工，并表示将斥资 45 亿美元建造该工厂，制药商们希望响应唐纳德-特朗普总统的号召，以更低的成本在美国生产更多的药品。【原文：AstraZeneca broke ground on a new plant in Virginia on Thursday and said it would spend $4.5 billion on the facility as drugmakers look to respond to President Donald Trump's call for more medicines to be made in the U.S. and at lower costs.】

item.title: 独家报道：美国药店和药品折扣店正与政府讨论 TrumpRx 的作用
item.description: 零售药店和处方药储蓄网站 GoodRx 正在与特朗普政府商讨加入其 TrumpRx 网站的事宜，他们告诉路透社，这表明该网站的范围将扩大，而不是像早期描述的那样，只是一个与制药公司直接折扣的链接。【原文：Retail pharmacies and prescription drug savings site GoodRx are talking with the Trump administration about joining its TrumpRx website, they told Reuters, suggesting an expansion beyond the early description of it as a link to pharmaceutical companies' direct discounts.】

item.title: 凤凰城大学首次登陆纽交所，股价飙升，估值达 13.5 亿美元
item.description: 凤凰城教育合伙公司（Phoenix Education Partners）周四在纽约证券交易所首次公开发行股票，股价大涨 18.8%，凤凰城大学所有者的估值达到 13.5 亿美元，因为它经受住了美国政府停摆的考验，进入了蓬勃发展的 IPO 市场。【原文：Phoenix Education Partners shares jumped 18.8% in their New York Stock Exchange debut on Thursday, valuing the University of Phoenix owner at $1.35 billion as it weathered a U.S. government shutdown to tap a booming IPO market.】

item.title: 通用汽车重新推出经济型博尔特电动车
item.description: 通用汽车公司（General Motors）周四表示，该公司将重新推出价格低廉的 Bolt 电动汽车，因为这家底特律汽车制造商希望扩大其在电动汽车领域的产品范围。【原文：General Motors said on Thursday it was bringing its affordable Bolt electric vehicle back, as the Detroit automaker looks to widen its offerings in the space.】

item.title: MercadoLibre 收购首家药店后将进军巴西在线医药市场
item.description: 拉丁美洲电子商务公司 MercadoLibre 当地负责人周四表示，该公司将通过其在巴西新收购的药店试水在线药品销售，这是进军巴西数十亿美元在线医药市场的第一步。【原文：Latin American e-commerce firm MercadoLibre will test the waters for online pharmaceutical sales through its newly acquired drugstore in Brazil, the company's local head said on Thursday, a first step in entering the country's multi-billion-dollar online medicine market.】

item.title: 加拿大统计局警告称贸易数据可能因美国政府停摆而延迟发布
item.description: 加拿大联邦统计局周四表示，如果美国政府停摆持续下去，该局可能不得不推迟在下个月发布九月份的国际贸易数据。【原文：Canada's federal statistics agency said on Thursday it might have to postpone releasing September international trade data next month if the U.S. government shutdown drags on.】

item.title: 花旗银行拒绝墨西哥集团竞购 Banamex 分公司
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup）周四拒绝了墨西哥矿业和运输集团墨西哥集团（Grupo Mexico）对其在墨西哥的零售部门（即 Banamex）的竞购，而是选择推进之前达成的交易。【原文：Citigroup on Thursday rejected Mexican mining and transport conglomerate Grupo Mexico's bid for its retail unit in the country, known as Banamex, opting instead to push forward with a previously agreed-upon deal.】

item.title: 非洲贸易集团东南非共同市场推出数字支付系统
item.description: 东部和南部非洲共同市场（Common Market for Eastern and Southern Africa）周四表示，该市场已推出数字支付系统，允许企业以当地货币结算交易，从而降低交易成本。【原文：The Common Market for Eastern and Southern Africa has launched a digital payments system to cut transaction costs by allowing businesses to settle deals in local currencies, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 致命矿难发生后，智利 Codelco 公司 8 月份铜产量下滑 25
item.description: 铜业委员会 Cochilco 周四提供的数据显示，智利国营矿业公司 Codelco 8 月份的铜产量下降了 25%，此前该公司盈利能力最强的矿山发生了致命的坍塌事故，导致产量受阻。【原文：Copper production from Chilean state-run miner Codelco tumbled 25% in August, data from copper commission Cochilco showed on Thursday, after a deadly collapse stunted output from its most-profitable mine.】

item.title: 黄金突破 4000 美元/盎司，巩固全球风向标地位
item.description: 黄金本周以前所未有的速度跃上每盎司 4,000 美元的里程碑，使其有望在今年取得自 1979 年伊朗革命以来的最好成绩，巩固其作为全球地缘政治和经济晴雨表的地位。【原文：Gold's unprecedented ascent this week to the $4,000 an ounce milestone and beyond puts it on course for its best year since the Iranian Revolution in 1979, solidifying its status as a barometer for global geopolitics and the economy.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，德国 PSI 软件公司接近被收购，投资者正在围观
item.description: 三位熟知内情的人士周四告诉路透社，德国 PSI 软件公司即将被收购，多家金融投资者正在围攻这家能源网络软件制造商。【原文：Germany's PSI Software is close to being taken over, with several financial investors circling the maker of software for energy networks, three people familiar with the matter told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 特斯拉在中国注册更长距离的 "Model Y+"计划
item.description: 根据中国工业部网站周四公布的申报信息，电动汽车制造商特斯拉已计划在中国推出续航里程更长的Model Y车型。【原文：EV-maker Tesla has registered plans for a longer-range variant of its Model Y in China, according to filing information that appeared on China's industry ministry website on Thursday.】

item.title: 股票估值过高引发投资者对市场泡沫的担忧
item.description: 华尔街股市的大幅反弹引发了投资者对泡沫形成的担忧，这可能导致股市大幅回调。【原文：The steep rally in Wall Street stocks is sparking worries among investors of a bubble forming, which could lead to a significant correction.】

item.title: 英伟达支持的 Reflection AI 获得 20 亿美元融资，估值升至 80 亿美元
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）支持的初创公司 Reflection AI 周四表示，该公司在新一轮融资中筹集了 20 亿美元，估值达 80 亿美元，投资者对人工智能的兴趣有增无减。【原文：Reflection AI, a startup backed by Nvidia, said on Thursday it has raised $2 billion in a new funding round that values the company at $8 billion, as investor interest in artificial intelligence remains unabated.】

item.title: 随着机队规模扩大，空中客车公司的飞机服务量急剧上升
item.description: 空中客车公司预测，未来 20 年飞机服务的平均增长率为 3.6%，将为 235 万飞行员、机械师和其他工人创造就业机会，以满足航空旅行增长的需要。【原文：Airbus is predicting 3.6% average growth in aircraft services over the next 20 years, creating jobs for 2.35 million pilots, mechanics and other workers to meet air travel growth.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 Younited 启动 4 亿欧元仓库融资机制
item.description: 提供个人贷款和信贷的金融科技公司Younited宣布，它获得了美国花旗银行4亿欧元（约合4.6448亿美元）的仓库融资贷款，由法国和意大利的消费贷款支持。【原文：Fintech firm Younited , which provides personal loans and credit, announced it secured a 400 million euros ($464.48 million) warehouse financing facility with U.S. bank Citi , backed by French and Italian consumer loans.】

item.title: 谷歌称 "数十家机构 "受到与甲骨文有关的黑客攻击活动影响
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司称，数十家公司受到了针对甲骨文公司商业产品套件的黑客攻击活动的影响。【原文：Alphabet-owned Google said dozens of companies have been affected by an ambitious hacking campaign that targeted Oracle's suite of business products.】

item.title: 中国出口管制针对的五种稀土是什么？
item.description: 中国周四表示，计划在其出口管制清单上再增加五种稀土元素和相关材料，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和习近平举行会谈之前加强对该行业的控制。【原文：China said on Thursday it planned to add five more rare earth elements and related materials to its export controls list, tightening its grip on the sector ahead of talks between Presidents Donald Trump and Xi Jinping.】

item.title: 巴西中央银行行长称暂停紧缩意味着利率水平将维持更长时间
item.description: 巴西央行货币政策主管尼尔顿-戴维（Nilton David）周四表示，决策者决定中断货币紧缩周期，这要求保持利率不变的时间比继续提高利率的时间更长。【原文：Brazil's central bank monetary policy director Nilton David said on Thursday that the decision by policymakers to interrupt the monetary tightening cycle requires keeping interest rates unchanged for longer than if they had continued raising them.】

item.title: 全球市场对加沙两年战争的反应
item.description: 以下五张图表显示了过去两年全球金融市场对以色列和哈马斯之间战争的波动反应。【原文：Below are five charts showing the volatile response of global financial markets to the war between Israel and Hamas over the last two years.】

item.title: 尽管食品价格下降，巴西 9 月通胀仍有所反弹
item.description: 统计机构巴西地理统计局（IBGE）周四公布的数据显示，尽管食品价格持续走低，巴西 9 月份的通胀率仍恢复了增长。【原文：Brazil's inflation resumed growth in September, despite the continuous easing in food prices, data from statistics agency IBGE showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国收紧出口管制后稀土矿商股价上涨
item.description: 稀土矿商的股票在周四早盘交易中上涨，此前中国收紧了对武器和电子行业至关重要的金属的出口管制，旨在限制向海外国防公司和半导体用户发货。【原文：Shares of rare earths miners rose in morning trade on Thursday after China tightened export controls on metals crucial to the weapons and electronics industries, aiming to limit shipments to overseas defense firms and semiconductor users.】

item.title: 铜价自 2024 年 5 月以来首次触及每吨 11,000 美元
item.description: 周四，铜价触及每吨 11,000 美元，这是 16 个多月来从未见过的水平，原因是铜矿大面积中断引发了对供应短缺的担忧，并吸引了投机资金流入。【原文：Copper prices hit $11,000 per metric ton on Thursday, a level not seen in over 16 months, as widespread disruption at mines sparks fears of a shortage of supply and attracts speculative inflows.】

item.title: 谷歌为企业客户推出双子座企业人工智能平台
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司周四推出了一个面向企业客户的新人工智能平台，名为 "双子座企业"（Gemini Enterprise）。【原文：Alphabet's Google on Thursday launched a new AI platform for business customers called Gemini Enterprise, as the tech giant ramps up efforts to capture more corporate clients with its artificial intelligence tools.】
